CEvent
CEvent

Defines a smart wrapper for handling events

Functions
CEvent
explicit CEvent(
bool defaultState,
bool manualReset
)

Defines the constructor for an event

Parameters
defaultState
bool

Sets the initial state of the event

manualReset
bool

Specifies whether event needs to be manually reset

~CEvent
~CEvent()

Default destructor

Set
bool Set()

Sets the event

Returns

Returns true if event was successfully set. Otherwise returns false.

Clear
bool Clear()

Clears the event

Returns

Returns true if event was successfully reset. Otherwise returns false.

Wait
DWORD Wait(
DWORD dwTimeout
)

Waits till the event is signaled or times out

Parameters
dwTimeout
DWORD

time in milliseconds to wait before timing out

Returns

Returns true if event was successfully reset. Otherwise returns false.
